product_name: Polarmax AYG Tech Silkweight Long Underwear Crew Top - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Worn alone in mild weather or under your fleece jacket on a cold day, the Polarmax AYG Tech Silkweight long underwear crew top offers all-day comfort with its lightweight, high-performance fabric. Lightweight, breathable polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Flatlock seams minimize rubbing and chafing; antimicrobial finish helps reduce odor. Closeout.
